content: into the spaces between the stitches from the row below until you get to the last space this space is a little smaller than the others do not crochet into the last space between stiches of the row below you will skip this space it is marked by the gold needle in the photo below life s not a race crochet pattern © 2020 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful instead crochet into the top of your first stitch from the previous row this stitch is marked by the gold needle in the photo below this is the top of your chain 3 or csdc that started the previous row your row is complete please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern if you give design credit as life s not a race crochet pattern by pretty peaceful not for commercial use please do not share photos of this pattern on ly share the link to the pattern pdf on ravelry or the video tutorial thank you for your support life s not a race crochet pattern © 2020 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful to add a new cake or work around a knot use the russian join method to add a new cake you will need a yarn needle a hook and scissors if you find a knot cut the knot out and rejoin the yarn with this method 1 thread one yarn end onto the needle then insert the needle into the same piece of yarn about an inch back from the needle 2 weave the needle back and forth through the yarn a few times splitting the yarn in half as you poke the needle through insert your hook into the loop closest to the eye of the needle so you don t lose this loop 3 pull the needle through keeping the loop on the hook life s not a race crochet pattern © 2020 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful 4 thread the other yarn end onto your needle and pass the needle through the loop on your hook as soon as you get the needle into the loop you can remove the hook so it s out of the way 5 weave the needle back and forth through the new piece of yarn a few times and pull it through 6 trim the ends pinch and roll the join in your fingertips to smooth it out then continue crocheting having trouble watch the life s not a race video tutorial https //youtu be/mt6xjggwqkq here s a double_crochet between the stitches photo tutorial
